greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Nonzero differences of A006519 (highest power of 2 dividing n) and A003484 (Radon function).
comment: A006519 and A003484 differ only at every 16th term; this sequence forms the nonzero differences. Records form A101120. Equals the XOR BINOMIAL transform of A101122.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..16384
program: (MAGMA) [2^Valuation(16*n,2) - 8*Floor(Valuation(16*n,2)/4) - 2^(Valuation(16*n,2) mod 4): n in [1..50]]; // _G. C. Greubel_, Nov 01 2018
results.author: _Simon Plouffe_ and _Paul D. Hanna_, Dec 02 2004
